timeline.bodyText: Simply write exampleProject = exampleProjectSwicth.isChecked() to simplify this if/else. Or remove the variable entirely and use it directly in the function call of createProject().

timeline.bodyText: Please have a look at the UniqueNameProvider class. Getting a unique name with ascending values is already implemented there. Use something like return new UniqueNameProvider(default_project_name, listOfProjectNames).

replies.bodyText: The UniqueNameProvider class does not match the required pattern for the name, it would return "My project (1)" instead of "My project 1".
